name: KING
description:
The $KING algorithmic token serves as the backbone of:
rapidly growing ecosystem aimed towards bringing
liquidity and new use cases to the Avalanche blockchain. The
protocol's underlying mechanism dynamically adjusts $KINGâ€™s supply, pushing its price up or down relative to the price of $AVAX.

Inspired by tomb.finance, who was originally inspired by the idea behind Basis as well as its predecessors, king finance is a multi-token protocol which consists of the following three tokens:
- King Finance ($KING)
- KING Shares ($KSHARE) 
- KING Bonds ($KBOND)
